LightningComponentBundle.masterLabel: Dynamic Forms - Field Section via FieldSet
LightningComponentBundle.description: This allows to create field section based on fieldset

property.name: fieldSetApiName
property.label: Field Set API Name
property.description: Enter the FieldSet API Name whose fields you want to use to create a field section.

property.name: numberOfColumns
property.label: Number of Columns
property.description: Select the number of columns for the field section, default is taken as 2.

property.name: sectionLabel
property.label: Section Label
property.description: Enter the section label to be shown for field section. If not specified, FieldSet label be taken as default section label.

property.name: labelOverrides
property.label: Field Label Overrides
property.description: JSON Mapping of API name to new field label

property.name: helpTextOverrides
property.label: Help Text Overrides
property.description: JSON Mapping of API name to new help text

property.name: boundary
property.label: Include Boundary?
property.description: Set to true to include a box around the field section
